item.description: After having a conversation with some coworkers recently, Iâ€™ve realized that I subconsciously do a lot to maximize my efficiency when trying to focus on a task. I decided to take inventory of all the strategies that have stuck with me over the years in an effort to distill them down into a few simple tips that I (and hopefully you) can remember for the next time you need to focus on something.

item.title: Hello World: Rebuilding in the Dark
item.description:
$ cat /var/log/orphicsec/rebuild.log

Starting fresh. New blog, same chaos.

What Changed?

  • [+] Wider layout for more code
  • [+] Full monospace - as it should be
  • [+] Brutalist dark theme
  • [+] Zero bloat

What’s Coming?

  • Exploit development writeups
  • CTF solutions
  • Security research
  • Tool releases

Stay tuned for actual content.
